name: 5H00T R4C3R (ShootRacer)
description:
Made for the GMTK Jam 2018

-------------------------------------------------

In the far future, racers don't manually control their cars.

Instead, they fire REPULSOR DISKS at them from every angle in order to navigate treacherous courses. Train hard, and you just might be able to face the CHAMPION in the fabled ARENA. 

-------------------------------------------------
